alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; City and Borough of Wrangell; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 07 at 2:24PM AKST until December 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Prince of Wales Island, City and Borough of Wrangell, Ketchikan Gateway Borough and Annette Island. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds could blow around unsecured objects, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to shift from southeast to west as the system track northeastward.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; City and Borough of Wrangell; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island
